about_the_game:
Eleven months ago, the Moon was sent violently flying off course by a catastrophic explosion, depriving Earth of its steady stream of resources. Less importantly, the two maintenance workers on there when the explosion occurred have been stranded ever since.

It's not so bad, honestly. The Heart provides for everything, a practically infinite source that gives them water, food, and powers their satellite as they wait with ever dwindling hopes for rescue. At this point, Rose's biggest stressor is her blossoming relationship with her only companion-

The Heart has stopped.

The Moon Looks Beautiful Tonight: Definitive Edition is a Yuri Visual Novel about fear of the unknown. It is a story featuring sapphics, gender, and self-discovery. Inspired by PC98 games and sci-fi stories from the 90s, the re-release is a complete edit of the original story, including new graphics, an original OST, and an updated story.

The game includes:

  • 20,000~ words of story
  • 10+ gorgeous CGs inspired by PC98 games
  • An original soundtrack
  • A Moon with a broken heart

Minimum:
